\section*{Problem 18: similarityoftriangle.pdf p11 prob 11}
\textbf{Paraphrased problem:} Solve the stated question from the scanned page using standard methods. Focus on triangle similarity and ratios; medians scale with sides. If rounding is required, state the precision used.

\subsection*{Solution}

\begin{enumerate}[label=Step~\arabic*:]
  \item When the result is decimal, state the rounding rule (e.g., correct to $2$ d.p.) and round accordingly.
  \item Use triangle similarity to equate ratios of corresponding sides.
  \item If medians are involved, note that in similar triangles medians are proportional to corresponding sides.
  \item Substitute the given values to find the requested length/ratio/angle.
\end{enumerate}
